main event: Several individuals reported witnessing a bright, white, circular light moving at high speeds and making abrupt stops in the sky at San Marcos AFB, Texas on July 21, 1952.
interesting points: The object was observed traveling at a speed of approximately 700 to 1000 miles per hour and made a slight change of direction.
Descriptions of the object included a brilliant white light with a halo around it, and a blinking green light emanating from the object as it passed.
No noise was heard during the sightings, and there were no known air traffic or meteorological conditions to account for the sightings.
Eyewitnesses include trained military personnel such as Lt Col, Lt, Sgt, as well as Air Force personnel and a civilian.
The incident was confirmed by several observers, and there were conflicting statements which made analysis difficult.
sighted object: bright, white, circular light with a green blinking light
witnesses: military personnel and Air Force personnel
